person.persName: Edmund Pendleton Thomas (Henry County attorney, court clerk)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Son of Roland Thomas and Kate Johnston. Married to Mary S. Johnston on February 19, 1819. Father of Mary Thomas, Rowland Thomas, Edmund Thomas, Catherine Thomas, [Unknown] Thomas, [Unknown] Thomas, [Unknown] Thomas, and [Unknown] Thomas. Deputy in the Circuit and County Courts of Henry County from 1812 to 1827. Sheriff of Henry County from 1820 to 1821. Assistant clerk of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1824. Court Clerk of the Circuit and County Courts of Henry County from 1827 to 1862. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.
